testcase.name: Verify Eligibility for paid NHS Cost
testcase.system-out: Given User opened NHS website...............................................passed When User clicks on start button............................................passed Then User should navigate to next Page to select country....................passed And select Country as Wales and click on next button........................passed Then user should navigate to next page to select date of birth..............passed Then enter date of birth and then click on next button.....................passed Then user should navigate to next page to select material status............passed And select answer using radio button as Yes and then click on next button...passed Then user should navigate to next page to select benefits or tax credits....passed And select answer using radio button as No and then click on next button....passed Then User should navigate page about pregnancy or birth.....................passed And select answer using radio button as No and then click on the next button.passed Then User should navigate page about serving in the armed forces............passed And user select answer using radio button and click on next button..........passed Then User should navigate page about diabetes...............................passed And user select answer using radio button for diabetes and click on next....passed Then User should navigate page about glaucoma...............................passed And user select answer for glaucoma using radio button and click on next....passed Then User should navigate page about care home..............................passed And user select answer for care home using radio button and click on next...passed Then User should navigate page about savings investments or property........passed And user select answer for savings investments or property using radio button and click on next.passed Then user get the NHS costs.................................................passed
